name: Dance, Dude!
description:
You're the king of the dancefloor! But your body needs oxygen to execute your slick moves.

Use Q, E, A and D to move oxygen to your limbs. Let your heart pulse to the beat, never stop!

Dance moves require a lot of oxygen, so make sure to move it in time for your next special.

Music by Timbre: https://freesound.org/people/Timbre/sounds/552395/
